name: .VCV File Extension
summary: Learn about .VCV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Proprietary video format developed by ViewCave International; used for distributing free-to-view legal content monetized by unobtrusive overlay ads; can be viewed with ViewCave's VCV Player.

content: ViewCave VCV Player has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
